about_the_game:
Manage your very own Camp!

The summer is here.


American Campground Simulator gives you the chance to be an investor and manager of your own successful camping resort.
The challenge awaits you in operating this complicated and work-demanding business.
Are you up for it?

Serve the Best Food Ever!


Hungry guests will enjoy the varied cuisine of your establishment, with choices selected from all over the world.
Run the tables yourself or hire valued staff to serve your guests their favorite dishes.
Expand your food courts by investing more and serve as many people as you want.
Earn more income to expand your business in any direction you wish.

Amazingly Fun Events!


Your camp can grow in many ways. Establish an ATV shop where your guests can enjoy the wind and speed as they ride.
Offer surfing, paragliding, and much more to add enjoyment to your camp and increase your income.

A Luxurious Condo or a Nature Lover's Tent!


Provide sleeping accommodations for your guests. Buy and improve condos or manage your tent site.
Don’t forget to clean up after your guests to keep them happier.

Trouble Ahead!


Watch out for hooligans and thieves who can wreck your place. Hire help to see them out.

Fun and Games!


Manage and expand, but don't forget to join in on the fun as well.

name: American Campground Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+)
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10-capable GPU
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: With American Campground Simulator, you can build your dream campsite. Set up a cafe at the campsite, buy tents, and focus on growing by serving customers!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Turkish, Danish, Korean, Polish, Norwegian, Portuguese - Portugal
*languages with full audio support
